text: Nɨ arazir kurar kam damightɨ, kɨ aghumsɨzir ekiam inigh, ua gumazamizibar damazimɨn daruan kogham. Eghtɨ Israelia bar mɨkɨm suam, nɨ bar ikufi, egh me nɨ dɨpova bar pazɨvɨra nɨ mɨkɨmɨva bar nɨ abɨragham. Ga uaning! Nɨ arazir kam datɨrɨghɨn a damusɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Nɨ nan ikɨsɨ ifuegh, ga uan afeziam Atrivim Devitɨn azaraka. Nɨ nan ikɨsɨ, a ti nɨn amamangatɨgham.”
